Title: Hiroshima Mon Amour
Actors: Emmanuelle Riva, Eiji Okada, Stella Dassas, Pierre Barbaud
Plot: A French woman and a Japanese man have an affair while she is in Japan making a film about peace and the impact of the atomic bomb on Hiroshima, The man, an architect, lost his family in the bombing. She recalls her lover during the war, a 23 year-old German soldier who later died. Despite the time they spend together, her attachment appears minimal and they go forward into the future.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 6 wins & 9 nominations.
Production: Como Film, Argos Films, Daiei Studios, Pathé Entertainment
